summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the deserialization of QPY-encoded quantum circuits, exercising a wide range of circuit components such as standard and custom gates, various parameter types, different register configurations, control‑flow constructs, and circuit metadata, as well as custom object serialization.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of Qiskit's QPY loading functionality, preventing regressions and ensuring compatibility across diverse circuit features and user‑defined objects.
